Hiedeggersartre's theory is interesting but still flawed. Yuu didn't leave for college. He CAME BACK so he could go to college. What type of college lasts for less than 3 years anyway? His reason for leaving is never mentioned for some reason. But then again, the questionable grammar makes things a bit difficult. Also, time didn't pass in the last page. The cherry blossoms are there but Yuu is still wearing the same clothes he was wearing when he went to Shuuji's house, and Shuuji even apologizes for ditching him. Page 1 also has cherry blossoms. It can't be snow because Japanese entrance exams for college happen in late winter. So yeah, Yuu didn't start dating the girl, but once again, nothing makes sense so it's useless to try and theorize. The author hates us.

I was about to type my own theory here, but this story is too fucking vague so I just gave up. The girl was already having sex with Shuuji back in high school, so they've been having sex nonstop for 3 or 4 whole years at the very least. When Yuu calls the girl on page 20, he's probably already back in town (otherwise he would have no reason to be glad that his friends didn't change), which means the girl was still fucking Shuuji behind the scenes. I was going to theorize that Shuuji called Yuu in the end to tell him that he's dating the girl now, because let's be honest, she has feelings for Shuuji too. But then why the fuck is she blushing at Yuu on page 2? Did Shuuji "claim" her after they went home? But he called Yuu on page 3 before having the chance to do that. Were they already dating before that? She was probably "mad" at Shuuji because Yuu came back and Shuuji was still persisting, but that's also just speculation. So many fucking questions and no answers.

To sum it up, it's a complicated NTR love triangle relationship. The girl at first love 2 guy at the same time. But, she love the MC more than his friend. After MC left the town 3 years ago, the MC's friend who love the girl want to become her girlfriend, and the girl seemingly give up on MC. After so many "cheating" sex later, the girl realize her true love is for the MC, making the MC the winner of the girl heart. The MC's friend intended to confess about fucking the girl when he was gone for 3 years .

So yeah, this girl maybe is a slut, but she still choose the MC in the end. Or maybe they could just share?
